plans.description1: Another name for a one-page site is a Landing Page. The page is easy to use and introduces the customer to the information they need.
plans.description2: It is the ‘business card’ of the company on the Internet. The site is to introduce the company’s services or products to the people visiting the business page.
plans.description3: This website is created based on your order. You can order any website you want.
